text: Pope Pius may mean: *Pope Pius I (c. 140–154, but Vatican lists 142/146 – 157/161) *Pope Pius II (1458–1464) *Pope Pius III (1503–1503) *Pope Pius IV (1559–1565) *Pope Pius V (1566–1572) *Pope Pius VI (1775–1799) *Pope Pius VII (1800–1823) *Pope Pius VIII (1829–1830) *Pope Pius IX (1846–1878) *Pope Pius X (1903–1914) *Pope Pius XI (1922–1939) *Pope Pius XII (1939–1958) Pius
title: Pope Pius
